name: At The Station
description:
Many bug fixes hopefully coming soon!

~ Play Full Screen For The Best Experience! (Bottom Right Hand Corner) ~

CREDITS:

Beautiful Music by Zucchini !! https://zucchini3d.itch.io

Art, Programming, Writing by Mad Soup

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

A walking simulator about trying to catch the train and meeting a little puppy. 

Interact with glowing objects / objects with a triangle over it and learn more about why this trip is so important.

Arrow keys - Move

Space - Jump

Z - Interact
